name: geno-1
description: Web (WASM): uses `wasm-pack` to build and a static `index.html` to run

scripts.build: wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg --out-name app_web --release && cp env.js pkg/env.js && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/pkg && cp pkg/app_web.js dist/pkg/ && cp pkg/app_web_bg.wasm dist/pkg/ && cp env.js dist/pkg/env.js && cp index.html dist/index.html && cp favicon.svg dist/favicon.svg
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.ci: npm run build && node server.js & SERVER_PID=$!; node scripts/wait-for-server.js && node web-test.js; kill $SERVER_PID 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.check:rust: cargo fmt --all -- --check && cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets -- -D warnings && cargo test --workspace --all-targets
scripts.check: npm run check:rust && npm run ci
